# Topic 02 — 邮件：建议 + 说明

## Directions (要求)

<Bilingual cn="你的一个外国朋友一直在寻找 AI 工具来提高学习效率。给他/她写一封电子邮件推荐一个，并解释你的理由。">A foreign friend of yours has been looking for AI tools to enhance learning efficiency. Write him/her an e-mail to make a recommendation and explain your reasons.</Bilingual>
<br>
<Bilingual cn="在答题纸上写100个单词左右。">Write your answer in about 100 words on the ANSWER SHEET.</Bilingual>
<br>
<Bilingual cn="不要在邮件中使用你自己的名字。请使用“Li Ming”。(10分)">Do not use your own name in your e-mail. Use “Li Ming” instead. (10 points)</Bilingual>

<br>

## ✏️ 参考范文

<Bilingual cn="亲爱的斯凯：">Dear Sky,</Bilingual>

<p><Bilingual cn="很高兴得知你在寻找 AI 工具来提高学习效率。今天我写信来是想做个推荐。">I am quite pleased to hear that you are looking for AI tools to promote learning efficiency. Today, I am writing to make a recommendation.</Bilingual></p>

<p><Bilingual cn="建议你在学习中尝试几个 AI 工具，因为通过试用这些工具，你能够知道哪个最符合你的需求。">It is advisable for you to try out several AI tools in learning since it is by trying them out that you can know which one can best suit your needs.</Bilingual> <Bilingual cn="一个典型的例子就是我自己。作为一名正在准备考研的大学四年级学生，我试过文心一言、通义和 Kimi。">A case in point is myself. As a senior who is preparing for the national entrance exams for postgraduate studies, I tried ERNIE Bot, Tongyi, and Kimi.</Bilingual> <Bilingual cn="最终，我选择了 Kimi，它的特点是在信息搜集方面表现出色。">In the end, I chose Kimi, which is characterized by its excellent performance in information collection.</Bilingual> <Bilingual cn="这个 AI 工具能够让我更高效，激发我对学习的热情，并帮助我节省时间和精力。">This AI tool can bring me high efficiency, inspire my passion for learning, and help me save time and energy.</Bilingual></p>

<p><Bilingual cn="等你试用之后，我期待与你探讨 AI 工具的更多细节。">I am looking forward to discussing more details of the AI tools after you use them.</Bilingual></p>

<Bilingual cn="祝好，">Best wishes,</Bilingual>
<br>
<Bilingual cn="李明">Li Ming</Bilingual>
